chunk:
Directions: Apply a smooth, even layer to skin after cleansing and toning. Leave on for 10 minutes then remove with a soft, damp cloth. Use up to 3 times per week.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
